column3: Appveyor started failing: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/DrahtBot/bitcoin/builds/37488791\nThen started passing again (same commit): https://ci.appveyor.com/project/DrahtBot/bitcoin/builds/37491951\nThen started failing again on all builds. Thus, the issue must be upstream.
Hmm not so sure, I've been building on the latest Appveyor image successfully. Will have a look.

Seems like something is broken between appveyor and vcpkg. I haven't been able to re-produce yet. I will keep trying.\n\nIf you want a temporary fix you can use my cached versions of the vcpkg dependencies by setting the two environment variables below in the Appveyor settings. It results in the packages being downloaded as binaries from one of my previous appveyor builds instead of building fro
Seems to have fixed itself. Glitch in the matrix.
